top_reviews.title: Bet You Cant Buy Just One!
top_reviews.body: The media could not be loaded. I love this blouse. Its charming and not fussy at all. You can toss it in the wash without ruining the finish. It has the versatility to go up and down the scale: casual, fancy, professional. Theres nothing this blouse cant do. I have three colors and Ive got my eye on a fourth.Read more

top_reviews.title: Nice
top_reviews.body: Bought size large and Im pleased with the fit. See photo. Im 140lbs, 56, bra size 36B , I usually wear medium or large depending on the brand. I havent laundered it yet. date.raw: Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2021

top_reviews.title: I just love the collar and everything about this shirt
top_reviews.body: Got me a new date night shirt. Sizing on this is perfect and I'm wearing a size small in the pictures. I'm 5 ft 8 in tall for your reference. I just love the collar and the lapel on the shirt. The fabric is super comfortable. The length of it is perfect and does not go below my butt but covers the bottom part of my waist and stops at the top part of my butt line. Another thing I really liked about this top was the price. I'd expect to pay double for a shirt of this quality in a store if it were a name brand.Read more

date.raw: Reviewed in the United States on March 31, 2021

top_reviews.title: So flattering if you pick your correct size
top_reviews.body: I'm average size and the fit is perfect, not tight and not baggy, loose where it needs to be and semi fitted everywhere else. If you're honest about your body size and you pick the appropriate size, it will be flattering on you. If this shows off your tummy or any fat rolls, then you need to go up one size. I am going to buy this in more colors.Read more

date.raw: Reviewed in the United States on June 2, 2021

top_reviews.title: Nice quality top
top_reviews.body: So I ordered this top in the long sleeve and short sleeve. I wasn't quite sure what size to order so I ordered 2 different sizes. In the long sleeve I ordered an XL to be sure that the girls have room to breath (38DD). The XL fit great and comfortable but I wondered if a L would give a more tailored look. I ordered the L in the short sleeve black. The L fits good as well. It's not tight, the girls have room but with a more tailored, slim look. When you have big breasts you have to order bigger sizes to accommodate the girls which doesn't always mean the rest of the top fit the way you'd like. So if you're like me, 5'4 between 175-180 lbs and a 38DD, you can order the XL for a loose fit but not too loose where you're swimming in it or you can order a L for a slim fit that is not tight at all with breathing space for the girls. To me, the L gives the appearance of a slim waist while the XL just hides it all together. Ot depends on the look that you want. Love both tops and I plan to order more in a L.Read more
top_reviews.body_html:

When you have big breasts you have to order bigger sizes to accommodate the girls which doesn't always mean the rest of the top fit the way you'd like. So if you're like me, 5'4 between 175-180 lbs and a 38DD, you can order the XL for a loose fit but not too loose where you're swimming in it or you can order a L for a slim fit that is not tight at all with breathing space for the girls. To me, the L gives the appearance of a slim waist while the XL just hides it all together. Ot depends on the look that you want. Love both tops and I plan to order more in a L.

date.raw: Reviewed in the United States on April 12, 2022

top_reviews.title: Great for zooM meetings
top_reviews.body: Very comfortable. Easy to dress up or dress down, especially for zoom meetings all day. You can throw on earrings and necklace and boom you look polished (while wearing sweatpants and slippers). It is a bit sheer. I had to wear a cami under so you couldnt see all the details of my bra. Cute with leggings, jeans, sweats. Perfect for remote work. I sized up. I have a few of the short sleeve versions and they are form fitting around the bust.Read more
top_reviews.body_html:
Very comfortable. Easy to dress up or dress down, especially for zoom meetings all day. You can throw on earrings and necklace and boom you look polished (while wearing sweatpants and slippers). It is a bit sheer. I had to wear a cami under so you couldnt see all the details of my bra. Cute with leggings, jeans, sweats. Perfect for remote work. I sized up. I have a few of the short sleeve versions and they are form fitting around the bust.

date.raw: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2021

top_reviews.title: Perfect Fitting Shirt
top_reviews.body: I purchased this shirt for a full day of traveling as I was moving cross country and needed a light top that could be layered. The shirt is super soft and the puff sleeves are flattering. It doesnt hold wrinkles either! The neckline doesnt come down too low and show cleavage so it would also be wonderful tucked into a pencil skirt or structured pants for work. I plan on ordering this shirt in other colors and wearing them all of the time since its so comfy and I love the neckline so much.Read more
top_reviews.body_html:

date.raw: Reviewed in the United States on March 3, 2021

top_reviews.title: Cute!
top_reviews.body: This turned out to be really cute. It is flattering as long as your not wearing it tight. Even fairly loose it showed a tummy roll. But I am sure it will look great with high waisted jeans. I wore it with black slacks and send my husband commented on how nice I looked. The cut make it appear a bit more dressier and works perfect for the classroom I work in. I purchased an xl in Watermelon and I am 180lbs & 59. I am pleased with this purchase and have thought about buying another color.Read more

date.raw: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2021

top_reviews.title: Bonitas diseo
top_reviews.body: Me gust mucho el modelo, no es pegada ni se me marca nada, pero deca que pidiera talla un poco mayor a la usual y no, me qued un poco grande. La tela es gruesa y yo quera algo ms fresco pero est bonita. (La cambiara por L en lugar de xl pero ya le haba quitado la etiquetas..)Read more
